name: Kubernetes
label: Kubernetes
hint: Select the environment where you want to deploy Logz.io Telemetry Collector.

datasources.name: Kubernetes
datasources.label: Kubernetes
datasources.description: Logz.io uses OpenTelemetry instrumentation with Fluentd and Helm charts to deploy and monitor Kubernetes architecture.
datasources.hint: Select the type of data you'd like to ship: logs, metrics, and traces.

params.name: envID
params.label: Environment Name
params.description: The name for your environments identifier, to easily identify the telemetry data for each environment.
params.hint: By typing an environment name, the name will be added as a label to the telemetry data of your environment.
params.patternError: Only letters, numbers, dashes and underscores are allowed

params.name: isTaint
params.label: Taints and Tolerations
params.description: Taints allow a node to repel a series of pods. Tolerations are applied to pods and allow them to schedule onto nodes with matching taints. Enable to force deployment on all pods.
params.hint: By checking this option the Logz.io Telemetry Collector will be deployed on all nodes.

telemetries.hint: Switch the toggle on if you want Logz.io Telemetry Collector to collect logs from your Kubernetes cluster components and applications pods
Switch the toggle on if you want Logz.io Telemetry Collector to collect metrics from your Kubernetes cluster, nodes and pods

params.name: isFilter
params.label: Collect only recommended metrics
params.hint: Check this box if you want Logz.io Telemetry Collector to collect only the relevant system metrics to populate Kubernetes 360 and prebuilt dashboards. In addition, we will also collect application metrics that are exposed by your pods.

params.name: isObjectLogs
params.label: Collect correlated Kubernetes resource object logs
params.hint: Check this box if you want Logz.io Telemetry Collector to collect Kubernetes resource object logs that correlate with metrics to populate Kubernetes 360 and prebuilt dashboards.

telemetries.hint: The Logz.io Telemetry Collector gathers traces and aggregated metrics from applications that are instrumented and running in Kubernetes.
